I can see you're having a Spring Boot application startup issue. The main problem is a database connection error: "Public Key Retrieval is not allowed". This is a common MySQL connection issue that's preventing your application from starting.

Let me examine your project structure and database configuration to help you fix this.
Now let me check your database configuration:

Perfect! I found the issue. The problem is in your MySQL connection URL. The "Public Key Retrieval is not allowed" error occurs when connecting to MySQL 8.0+ servers, and it can be resolved by adding specific parameters to your connection URL.

Here's the fix:
Now let's also check if your MySQL database is running and accessible. Let me also add a driver class name specification to ensure proper MySQL connectivity:

content.lineBasedDiff:
--- src/main/resources/application.properties
+++ src/main/resources/application.properties
@@ -6,6 +6,7 @@
 spring.datasource.url=jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/pigin_db?useSSL=false&serverTimezone=UTC&allowPublicKeyRetrieval=true&useUnicode=true&characterEncoding=utf8
 spring.datasource.username=${DATABASE_USERNAME:root}
 spring.datasource.password=${DATABASE_PASS}
+spring.datasource.driver-class-name=com.mysql.cj.jdbc.Driver
 spring.jpa.hibernate.ddl-auto=create
 spring.jpa.show-sql=false
 spring.jpa.properties.hibernate.format_sql=true

content.text: The compilation is now working better, but there are JJWT API compatibility issues. The `parserBuilder()` method doesn't exist in the version 0.12.6. Let me check the JWT-related files to understand the current usage and fix the API calls:
The issue is that in JJWT version 0.12.6, the API has changed. The `parserBuilder()` method has been replaced with `parser()`. Let me update all the JWT-related files to use the correct API:

@@ -39,11 +39,11 @@
 
     @Override
     public String extractUsername(String token) {
-        return Jwts.parserBuilder()
-                .setSigningKey(key)
+        return Jwts.parser()
+                .verifyWith(key)
                 .build()
-                .parseClaimsJws(token)
-                .getBody()
+                .parseSignedClaims(token)
+                .getPayload()
                 .getSubject();
     }

--- src/main/java/org/example/infrastructure/adapter/output/implementations/TokenUseCaseImpl.java
+++ src/main/java/org/example/infrastructure/adapter/output/implementations/TokenUseCaseImpl.java
@@ -48,11 +48,11 @@
     }
 
     private boolean isTokenExpired(String token) {
-        Date expiration = Jwts.parserBuilder()
-                .setSigningKey(key)
+        Date expiration = Jwts.parser()
+                .verifyWith(key)
                 .build()
-                .parseClaimsJws(token)
-                .getBody()
+                .parseSignedClaims(token)
+                .getPayload()
                 .getExpiration();
         return expiration.before(new Date());
     }
